name: Mumba: A Journey Across Worlds - beta
name_original: Mumba: A Journey Across Worlds - beta
description:
"A journey Across Worlds" is story about the main character, Mumba, exploring different worlds and learning about himself. In this beta, the main character will venture around a boot camp and learn what it means to be a soldier.

THE PROCESS: The beta took about two weeks to develop and was coded in Visual Studio and pieced together in Unity. Art assets were imported from the Unity Asset Store and Adobe Mixamo. Each level has demonstrates scenarios in which the character may face in the future of the game, such as getting to a captive soldier or stealth. The game is designed to feel like an adventure strategy game.
